questions.question: A plane surface may be positioned in a space concerning the three principal planes of projection in any of the following positions, which one of the following is false?

answers.a: Parallel to one of the principal planes and perpendicular to the other two
answers.b: Perpendicular to one of the principal planes and inclined to the other two.
answers.d: Inclined to all the three principal planes.
